name: CSS Fundamentals
description: Learn how to style web pages beautifully using CSS. Master selectors, properties, the box model, and layout systems like Flexbox and Grid.
whatYouLearn: Apply styles to HTML elements using CSS selectors
Understand the Box Model and layout properties
Use Flexbox and Grid for page layouts
Work with colors, fonts, and spacing

exercises.title: Change Text Color
exercises.description: Style text using CSS properties such as color and font-size.
exercises.theory: CSS allows you to style HTML elements. The color property changes text color, and font-size adjusts the text size.
exercises.objective: Change the text color and size of a heading element.
hints: Use color names like blue, red, etc.
Font size can be in px or rem

exercises.title: Center a Div Using Flexbox
exercises.description: Use Flexbox properties to center a div both horizontally and vertically.
exercises.theory: Flexbox is a powerful layout system in CSS that allows easy alignment and distribution of elements in a container.
exercises.objective: Center an element using Flexbox properties.

references.title: MDN CSS Basics
references.description: Learn core CSS concepts from Mozilla Developer Network.

references.title: CSS Tricks
references.description: A great resource for CSS patterns and design ideas.
